components.description: Shimano EF-50 Easy Fire integrated shifter / brake lever
SR Suntour XCC-T202 42,34,24 hardened steel chainrings with chainguard
SR Suntour TP-17 31.8 top pull Men's (F), Shimano TX-30 (R)
